name: nginx_up
description: Indicates if NGINX is up (1 for up, 0 for down)

name: nginx_connections_active
description: Number of active client connections

name: nginx_connections_accepted
description: Total number of accepted client connections

name: nginx_connections_handled
description: Total number of handled connections

name: nginx_connections_reading
description: Number of connections where NGINX is reading the request header

name: nginx_connections_writing
description: Number of connections where NGINX is writing the response back to the client

name: nginx_connections_waiting
description: Number of idle client connections waiting for a request

name: nginx_http_requests_total
description: Total number of client requests

name: nginx_http_requests_current
description: Number of current client requests

name: nginx_http_requests_duration_seconds
description: Histogram of request processing time in seconds

name: nginx_http_requests_size_bytes
description: Histogram of request sizes in bytes

name: nginx_http_responses_total
description: Total number of responses, labeled by status code

name: nginx_http_responses_size_bytes
description: Histogram of response sizes in bytes

name: nginx_http_upstream_requests_total
description: Total number of upstream requests

name: nginx_http_upstream_responses_total
description: Total number of upstream responses, labeled by status code

name: nginx_http_upstream_response_time_seconds
description: Histogram of upstream response times in seconds

name: nginx_http_upstream_response_length_bytes
description: Histogram of upstream response sizes in bytes

name: nginx_stream_upstream_connections_total
description: Total number of stream upstream connections

name: nginx_stream_upstream_connect_time_seconds
description: Histogram of stream upstream connect times in seconds

name: nginx_stream_upstream_first_byte_time_seconds
description: Histogram of stream upstream first byte times in seconds

name: nginx_stream_upstream_response_time_seconds
description: Histogram of stream upstream response times in seconds

name: nginx_cache_hits_total
description: Total number of cache hits

name: nginx_cache_misses_total
description: Total number of cache misses

name: nginx_cache_bypass_total
description: Total number of cache bypasses

name: nginx_cache_stale_total
description: Total number of stale cache responses served

name: nginx_cache_updating_total
description: Total number of cache updating responses

name: nginx_cache_revalidated_total
description: Total number of cache revalidations

name: nginx_upstream_server_response_time_seconds
description: Response time from upstream servers

name: nginx_upstream_server_requests_total
description: Total number of requests to upstream servers

name: nginx_upstream_server_bytes_sent_total
description: Total bytes sent to upstream servers

name: nginx_upstream_server_bytes_received_total
description: Total bytes received from upstream servers

name: nginx_upstream_server_state
description: State of upstream servers (1 for up, 0 for down)

name: nginx_upstream_server_weight
description: Weight of upstream servers

name: nginx_upstream_server_max_conns
description: Maximum connections for upstream servers

name: nginx_upstream_server_active
description: Number of active connections to upstream servers

name: nginx_upstream_server_requests
description: Number of requests to upstream servers

name: nginx_upstream_server_responses_total
description: Total responses from upstream servers by status code

name: nginx_upstream_server_bytes_sent
description: Bytes sent to upstream servers

name: nginx_upstream_server_bytes_received
description: Bytes received from upstream servers

name: nginx_upstream_server_fails_total
description: Total number of failed requests to upstream servers

name: nginx_upstream_server_unavailable_total
description: Total number of times upstream servers were unavailable

name: nginx_upstream_server_header_time_seconds
description: Time to receive the first byte of response header from upstream servers

name: nginx_upstream_server_response_length_bytes
description: Response length from upstream servers in bytes

name: nginx_slab_pages_used
description: Number of pages used in shared memory zones

name: nginx_slab_pages_free
description: Number of free pages in shared memory zones

name: nginx_slab_pages_total
description: Total number of pages in shared memory zones

name: nginx_slab_slot_used
description: Number of used slots in shared memory zones

name: nginx_slab_slot_free
description: Number of free slots in shared memory zones

name: nginx_slab_slot_total
description: Total number of slots in shared memory zones

name: nginx_limit_req_zone_requests_total
description: Total number of requests processed by rate limiting zones

name: nginx_limit_req_zone_delayed_total
description: Total number of requests delayed by rate limiting zones

name: nginx_limit_req_zone_rejected_total
description: Total number of requests rejected by rate limiting zones

name: nginx_limit_conn_zone_connections_total
description: Total number of connections processed by connection limiting zones

name: nginx_limit_conn_zone_rejected_total
description: Total number of connections rejected by connection limiting zones

name: nginx_stream_connections_total
description: Total number of stream connections

name: nginx_stream_connections_active
description: Number of active stream connections

name: nginx_stream_connections_handled
description: Total number of handled stream connections

name: nginx_stream_sessions_total
description: Total number of stream sessions by status

name: nginx_stream_sessions_duration_seconds
description: Histogram of stream session duration in seconds

name: nginx_stream_bytes_sent_total
description: Total bytes sent in stream connections

name: nginx_stream_bytes_received_total
description: Total bytes received in stream connections
